channel.title: Comments on: Taking The Week Off From Running Due To Pain
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Running is the only thing I managed to stick to, and at 35 I still have at least 20 years of it ahead of me... then I might switch. For now all the doctors say I'm fine and that I should rest and let it go away, which seems to be helping.
I just hope to be back to running in 2-3 weeks.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Unfortunately I run on uneven asphalt pavements mostly.
I went to see some doctors and nothing seems to be wrong with me so far. Might be just an infection that isn't related to muscle or bone. Rest seems to help for now, so I'm resting (following the advice of one of the doctors)
We'll see what I'll do when I'm back to working out. I've started considering going back to the gym for something other than running, but I prefer to go back to my routine.
